DOC.brief_summary: Administration of a single 50 mg or 200 mg dose of tigecycline will not cause a change in QT/QTc intervals.
DOC.brief_title: Study To Evaluate The Effect Of Single Intravenous Doses Of Tigecycline On QTc Intervals In Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: evaluation of effect of tigecycline on QT/QTc in healthy volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Body mass index 17.5 30.5 kg Total body weight greater than 50 kg Recent history of diarrhea Use of oral antibiotics in the last 2 weeks History of risk factors for QT prolongation pregnant females Nursing females
